io.mosip.registration.service.config

Interface GlobalParamService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalParamServiceImpl

    public interface GlobalParamService
    It interface with the external 'global' service and sync the application specific configuration data from server to local machine. It stores the downloaded configuration detail into local db that will be used by the application through out the life cycle. This service is invoked during start of the application OR post successful login to the application based on use cases.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sravya Surampalli, Yaswanth, Brahmananda Reddy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getGlobalParams()
      Fetching application configuration detail from Global parameters table, that will be used by the application.
      ResponseDTO synchConfigData(boolean isJob)
      It makes call to the external service 'global' to download the configuration from MOSIP server and sync the same with the local db.
      void update(String code, String val)
      Update global param table with particular key value pair which is download from the external system.
      ResponseDTO updateSoftwareUpdateStatus(boolean isUpdateAvailable, Timestamp timestamp)
      It checks the software update status flag from database and respond with 'Y' or 'N' value.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalParams

        Map<String,Object> getGlobalParams()
        Fetching application configuration detail from Global parameters table, that will be used by the application.
        Returns:
        map It contains the key and value pair of each configuration.

      • synchConfigData

        ResponseDTO synchConfigData(boolean isJob)
        It makes call to the external service 'global' to download the configuration from MOSIP server and sync the same with the local db. After downloading it does the following while updating db:
        • If any additional config available in local then delete the same.
        • If any additional config received from remote then insert the same.
        • If any updated received for the existing one then modify the same at local db.
        Parameters:
        isJob - whaeather it is triggerred by job or not
        Returns:
        response return success or failure response along with error based on service response.

      • updateSoftwareUpdateStatus

        ResponseDTO updateSoftwareUpdateStatus(boolean isUpdateAvailable,
                                       Timestamp timestamp)
        It checks the software update status flag from database and respond with 'Y' or 'N' value.
        Parameters:
        isUpdateAvailable - - update status
        timestamp - - the timestamp
        Returns:
        the response DTO It contains the SuccessResponseDTO, where the flag value would be available.

      • update

        void update(String code,
            String val)
        Update global param table with particular key value pair which is download from the external system.
        Parameters:
        code - global param code
        val - value
